items.sentence: Tom caught malaria while he was traveling in Africa.
Tom certainly has the right temperament for the job.
Tom certainly is aware that Mary is in the hospital.
Sorry, but it looks like I\'m booked up on that day.
Starting next week, I\'ll be working the late shift.
I\'m not worried about Tom. I\'m worried about Mary.
I\'ve never been to Boston, and Tom hasn\'t, either.
I\'ve promised Tom that I wouldn\'t do that anymore.
Tom scooted over so Mary could sit down next to him.
Tom seems to always be running into people he knows.
